other.precursor: If you are new to the ward
other.message: please come to the new move-in meeting after church in the bishop's office in the SE corner of the building.

other.precursor: For additional announcements and reminders throughout the week
other.message: join the "Members of the Provo Married Student 21st Ward" Facebook page (see "Leadership/Other Ward Info" section).

other.precursor: For appointments or ecclesiastical endorsements with the bishop or baby blessing info
To announce something in the program
other.message: contact Jeremy & Rebecca Jensen at ###-###-#### or _____@gmail.com.

events.title: Family History Pizza Night
events.info: Come enjoy pizza as you work on your family history. The family history consultants will be there to answer questions and help you find temple names for the ward temple trip in August.
